operation.add: <?php switch($language['code']) { //Add Here your opencart language code if is different of the list in module description in opencart.com web site case 'ru-ru': $langC[$language['language_id']] = 'ru'; break; default: $langC[$language['language_id']] = $language['code']; } ?>

$(function() { $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: '[data-slug=slug-result<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>', titleCase: false } }); $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', space: ' ', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>', titleCase: true }, callback: function(str) { $('.cMeta<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>').val(str.replace(/(?:^|\s)\S/g, function(a) { return a.toUpperCase(); })); } }); });

<?php switch($language['code']) { //Add Here your opencart language code if is different of the list in module description in opencart.com web site case 'pt-br': $langC[$language['language_id']] = 'pt'; break; default: $langC[$language['language_id']] = $language['code']; } ?>

$(document).ready( function() { $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: '[data-slug=slug-result<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>', titleCase: false } }); /* $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', space: ' ', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>', titleCase: true }, callback: function(str) { $('.cMeta<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>').val(str.replace(/(?:^|\s)\S/g, function(a) { return a.toUpperCase(); })); } }); */ });

<?php switch($lang) { //Add Here your opencart language code if is different of the list in module description in opencart.com web site case 'pt-br': $langC = 'pt'; break; default: $langC = $lang; } ?>

<script> $(document).ready( function() { $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: '[data-slug=slug-result<?php echo $langC; ?>]', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC; ?>', titleCase: false } }); $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', space: ' ', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC; ?>', titleCase: true }, callback: function(str) { $('.cMeta<?php echo $langC; ?>').val(str.replace(/(?:^|\s)\S/g, function(a) { return a.toUpperCase(); })); } }); }); </script>

<?php switch($language['code']) { //Add Here your opencart language code if is different of the list in module description in opencart.com web site case 'pt-br': $langC[$language['language_id']] = 'pt'; break; default: $langC[$language['language_id']] = $language['code']; } ?>

$(document).ready( function() { $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: '[data-slug=slug-result<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>', titleCase: false } }); $("[data-id=title-slug<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>]").stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', space: ' ', options: { lang: '<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>', titleCase: true }, callback: function(str) { $('.cMeta<?php echo $langC[$language['language_id']]; ?>').val(str.replace(/(?:^|\s)\S/g, function(a) { return a.toUpperCase(); })); } }); });
